name: .SSM File Extension
summary: Learn about .SSM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An SSM file is a metadata file used by RealPlayer, a media player application. It contains information that directs RealPlayer to the location of streaming media on a server (it does not store the actual media data being streamed). RealPlayer references SSM files to stream content without needing to download the entire multimedia file, providing faster playback and conserving storage space on the computer.

content: The SSM format was more common in the 2000s. The format has since become obscure as technology has progressed, and modern multimedia formats have been adopted.

instructions: You should not attempt to open SSM files. Instead, media players, like RealPlayer, reference the files to stream multimedia content.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
